name: Nightly Windows Builds
body:
Nightly builds of successful commits (midnight UTC)

These builds include all optional features; zip, rar, plugin support, and gstreamer (mp4/webm).

Only the 5 most recent builds are kept.

name: 2.0.0-beta
body:
Full commit log found [here 1.6.5...2.0.0-beta](https://github.com/ahodesuka/ahoviewer/compare/1.6.5...2.0.0-beta)
Windows version does not support plugins at the moment, and starts up some what slow.
It's also a lot larger in size because I included more gstreamer plugins to support more audio and video codecs.

54e44d9 booru/browser: Prevent tagentry from becoming invisible
d047146 README.md: Add info about configuring with OpenSSL and GnuTLS
9ef8dda mainwindow: Remove unused variable
39a1464 README.md: Remove ebuild link, ahoviewer is in Gentoo's package repo
4b041bf version.sh: Use single brackets for conditionals
0f04de0  LICENSE: Update year
57395bb booru/browser: Prevent crash after detaching and reattaching tabs
8027ced imagebox: Only queue redraw in set_image if the image isn't new

Windows installer includes more up to date versions of libraries.

3abe953 mainwindow: Use pattern filters for webm files on Windows
 dfc9745 src/Makefile: Rename DATADIR to AHOVIEWER_DATADIR
 594a7b6 booru/imagelist: Explicitly cancel thumbnail thread in clear
 d65aee0 tempdir: Use g_mkdtemp to make directories for booru image lists
48dcf62 archive/zip: Fix issue with long paths on Windows

b985099 build/installer: Remove bits from title a93af1d booru/page: Check success attribute on danbooru d080140 mainwindow: Update widget visibility based on local settings 64651a3 imagebox: Round scrolls up if end/start is within 50% of scroll

7e9d99e imagebox: Round scroll amount if it's near the end or start
a49d131 tempdir: Clean up any leftover temp directories on startup
7843a21 booru/browser: Add ability to copy image data

cafeb2d booru/page: Load next page when scrolling a little sooner

1a26ba0 booru/page: Fix crash when starting a new search from a loading tab

c806a59 booru/imagelist: Reduce m_Size when unsupported file is ignored

7fb6525 Do not explicitly capture this in lambdas

e134fd0 booru/image: Variable delay between draw requests for loading images
